subject: Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Sounders FC traded the designated player and two-time M.L.S. All-Star Freddie Ljungberg to the Chicago Fire for a conditional pick in either the 2011 or 2012 SuperDraft.
snippet: The Seattle Sounders FC traded the designated player and two-time M.L.S. All-Star Freddie Ljungberg to the Chicago Fire for a conditional pick in either the 2011 or 2012 SuperDraft.
